input:

- Noticeable weight gain despite no changes in your diet or activity level.
- Puffiness around your face, especially in the mornings.
- Constipation that has become more frequent over the last few weeks.
- Aching joints and muscle pain that seem to come and go.
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION gradually over the past three months, starting with the fatigue and weight gain, then progressing to facial puffiness and joint discomfort. You’ve noticed these changes are persistent and impacting your daily life, but you initially thought it was just stress or aging.

I’ve gained some weight, and my face looks puffier than usual, especially in the mornings. I also have these pains in my joints and muscles that come and go, and I’ve been constipated more often lately. It’s all kind of messing with my everyday life.
